about_the_game:
"The Sinking Structure, Clione, and Lost Child -Log3" (Play time : 30 minutes)

This is a continuation of "The Sinking Structure, Clione, and Lost Child -Log2".

Start with Log1.

Deployment of Log3: "A rumbles truth!"

They finally escaped from the collapsing scaffolding ...

The mystery of the vague world (structure) begins to be solved, and the astonishing facts are told!

And new characters begin to upset their future gears ...!

Two silent wanderers

6 full chapters

A game of exploration and adventure

A lost child, drifting in an odd husk, lands at a mysterious structure.

Clione, a manufactured doll you encounter.

You are Clione.

Your purpose? Protect this lost child.

What awaits you at the top of the slowly sinking structure?

What is a "Sinking Structure"?

What is the true identity of "Clione"?

Where did the "Lost Child" come from?

Major features

You can play with the keyboard or controller.

Actions include "running", "walking", "jumping", "climbing", etc., and you only have to press a button depending on the situation.

When walking with the controller, tilt the stick a little.

Operate some machine, investigate, and get information from the people you meet.

Lost child are at risk during their actions.

At this time, if you want to move the lost child, you can approach the lost child and "hold hands", and you can move together.

When a lost child comes into contact with water, a mysterious creature called ankh may appear and be attacked.

Clione's weapon is Taser only.

You will be able to fire after charging.

Aim with the Shift key or the left trigger.

Fire with the Space key or the A button.

When locked on, the aim will turn red and the taser bullet will be able to track.

In Log3, the story expands greatly.

Encounter new characters.

And some of the mysteries so far will be unraveled.

However, yet another mystery becomes clear and the confusion deepens.

Public schedule

Log1 / Released / no charge

Log2 / Released / no charge

Log3 / Released / no charge

Log4 / Released / no charge

Log5 / Released / no charge

Log6 / Released / no charge

-------------------------------

Start with Log1.

It continues from Log1 to Log6.

-------------------------------

When you operate the terminal, the route map is displayed ... However….

Let's listen to the story of the electrician.

You may be able to read the mystery of Log1 and Log2.

The delusion signal is output to only one hand.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows8 Windows10
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo or more
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT630 or more
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 320 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Required
